𒂆 GIN2 𒂆 = 𒂅 DUN3 gunû
𒂆 GÍN coin 🪙 "shekel" ⇔ 𒄘𒌦 GUN coin "talent"

𒂆 𒂇 AGA₃ ≈ 𒋃 aka3 Jacke

𒂆 ≈ 𒁕 𒀉 𒂆 ≈ 𒌋𒂆 ≈ 𒀳 ≈ 𒌋𒁕

𒂆 ṬU ⇔ DO 𓂡

𓂡 𒂇 AGA Ecke arc 𓊋
𓂡 𒂆 ṭa TU DO > 𓋴 Ɣamma Γ Gamma ?

𒂇𒂇 •agitate

𒂇 𒂆 #agû "tiara, crown" 𓎝 𓎛

Gunification may introduce an 's' or an 'r':
𒂆 AGA₃ ax
𒂇 AGAˢ axe āšĝar gunu

𒂆 > Γ Gamma

𒄑𒂆𒈦 Gilgameš

𒂆 ṭu ⇔ 𒌈 tum ?

𒂆 ṭu ⇔ 𒂅 TUN DÙN daʾn δin chin

𒂇𒃸 aga-kar2 𒂆𒃸 aga3-kar2 "to defeat to conquer to surround to besiege" #kalû kaşāru
